about.title: WKU Software Crew
about.subtitle: Software growth platform for Wonkwang University students

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: A student-driven software education platform to grow from Junior to Master through personal projects. Learn together like a club, give and receive mentoring, and gain real-world experience.

levelSystem.title: Level System
levelSystem.description: Earn XP by completing projects and grow through Junior, Senior, and Master levels.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Register personal and team projects, and manage your portfolio with GitHub integration.

community.title: Community
community.description: Ask and answer questions on the Q&A board, and exchange mentoring.

step1.title: Sign Up with GitHub
step1.description: Easily sign up and start with your GitHub account.

step2.title: Start a Project
step2.description: Start with your own project idea or join existing projects.

step3.title: Take Courses
step3.description: Learn necessary skills through level-appropriate courses.

step4.title: Level Up & Grow
step4.description: Complete projects and earn XP to advance to the next level.
